_xResult.title: Honey Honey Linen Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made linen blazer with hidden button closure
_xResult.longdesc:
Show up for life in this custom made linen jacket, expertly tailored with the finest craftmanship and unique fabric. This bright jacket is handcrafted out of linen. We love the texturized checkered pattern, curved collar and button-up front. 

 

 

Did you know? Linen naturally repels dirt! So you have to wash it less often. The planet will thank you. If you've never experienced having a coat or jacket made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
